modName: The Hairstyler - Salt and Wind Retexture
summary: Applies salt and wind textures to the hairstyler.
descriptionHtml:
Simply applies [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/91066?tab=files] these textures [/url] to some of the wigs from [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/48470] this mod [/url], which is required for this to work.

All credits go to [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/39428150] Shiva182 [/url] for the textures, and [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/2272336] Lycanthrops [/url] for The Hairstyler
author: Mateo Shiva182 and Lycanthrops

files.name: The Hairstyler - Salt and Wind Retexture
